name: Ancient Cultures: Tikal's Realm - preAlpha project
name_original: Ancient Cultures: Tikal's Realm - preAlpha project
description:
Pre alpha game's version showed in Brasil Game Show, to show our potential, to find an investor, a publisher, and also call on the public to support us.

Ancient Cultures: Tikal's Realm, is an action-adventure game that takes you to the height of one of the greatest Mayan civilizations. Become a legendary warrior of Tikal, train with the army of the time, explore mystical places of this mythology and finally, acquire the powers of the ancient gods.

Discord: https://discord.gg/hNXFwSjb

Linktre: https://linkr.bio/Triple11Eleven
